/s/place-of-supply-gst.title: Place Of Supply of Goods in GST
/s/place-of-supply-gst.metaDescription: Under GST, 'Place Of Supply' defines whether the transaction will be counted as intra-state or inter-state and are accordingly SGST, CGST & IGST are levied.

/Guide/claim-hra-interest-on-home-loan-d.title: Can you claim both HRA and deduction on home loan interest?
/Guide/claim-hra-interest-on-home-loan-d.metaDescription: You can enjoy both the tax benefits if the employer provides you with an HRA component as part of your salary and you are paying your home loan off

/s/gst-impact-works-contract/.title: Works Contract under GST- How Will GST Impact Works Contract?

/NRI/Rule37BB.title: What is Rule 37BB of the Income Tax Act for an NRI
/NRI/Rule37BB.metaDescription:
File Income Tax Returns online with ClearTax. ClearTax is fast, safe and very easy to use. Save money.
  ClearTax handles all cases of Income from Salary, Interest Income, Capital Gains, House Property, Business and Profession. ClearTax maximize your deductions by handling all deductions under Section 80 like section 80C, 80D, 80CCF, 80G, 80E, 80U and the rest.
  You can use your digital signature to e-file. Our products are trusted by hundreds of CAs and corporations for filing taxes and TDS.

/Guide/Form16A.title: Understanding Your Form-16A
/Guide/Form16A.metaDescription: Guide to understanding your Form-16A. Form-16A also called the TDS Certificate contains information about the TDS deducted by a deductor on payments to you. Form-16A is on TDS for non-salary payments.
